metadata.title: CVE-2025-1180 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in GNU Binutils2.43. This affects the function _bfd_elf_write_section_eh_frame of the filebfd/elf-eh-frame.c of the component ld. The manipulation leads to memorycorruption. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The complexityof an attack is rather high. The exploitability is told to be difficult.The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. It isrecommended to apply a patch to fix this issue.

criterions.comment: binutils package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
